front.title: MIF API extension for combining IEEE 802.21

abstract.t: The Application Program Interface (API) of MIF, specified in the MIF API consideration, must rely on lower layer functionalities when handover between homogeneous or heterogeneous networks is necessary. To improve the connectivity experience, the existing MIF API needs to be extended for solving such problem. IEEE is also aimed at the similar issue from different way. A kind of logical entities over the link layer protocol for handling the seamless handover has been defined in IEEE 802.21. This document proposes a mechanism via integrating MIF API and IEEE 802.21 to support application service better.
